full_text: Screened by NARA, 8/15/2023 10 Rs. FT GRA POF. GKINDIA 10RS TEN RUPEES @ S 2nt % mesture 243 901 221742 Eayth a 59 HQ Signature RELATIONSHIP FFIDAVIT We, (1). DAHYABHAI KUNVERJI PATEL, Birth Date:-25-12-1905, Birth Place :-PARDI PATA, TAL: PALSANA, DIST: SURAT, GUJARAT, INDIA, Nationality :- INDIAN, (2). DAHYABHAI KARABHAI PATEL, Birth Date:- 2-1-1904, Birth Place:- PARDI PATA, TAL: PALSANA, DIST: SURAT, GUJARAT, INDIA, Nationality:- INDIAN, both of them resident of PARDI PATA, TAL: PALSANA, DIST: SURAT, GUJARAT, INDIA, do hereby solemnly declare on oath as Under:- We know that JERAMBHAI S/O BHIKHABHAI MADHAVBHAI PATEL, is married to GANGABEN D/O NATHUBHAI RANCHHODBHAI PATEL, and during their marriage period the following Children born to them. (1). DAHYABHAI s/o JERAMBHAI BHIKHABHAI PATEL, was born at village PARDI PATA, TAL: PALSANA, DIST: SURAT, GUJARAT, INDIA, on 30-1-1929, (SON). (2). PREMIBEN D/O JERAMBHAI BHIKHABHAI PATEL, was born at village PARDI PATA, TAL : PALSANA, DIST: SURAT, GUJARAT, INDIA, on 10-10-1931, (DAUGHTER). (3). JEVANBHAI s/o JERAMBHAI BHIKHABHAI PATEL, was born at village PARDI PATA, TAL : PALSANA, DIST: SURAT, GUJARAT, INDIA, on 14-11-1934, (SON). (4). DAVILABEN D/O JERAMBHAI BHIKHABHAI PATEL, was born at village PARDI PATA, TAL : PALSANA, DIST: SURAT, GUJARAT, INDIA, on 25-10-1939, (DAUGHTER). (5). KISHORBHAI S/O JERAMBHAI BHIKHABHAI PATEL, was born at village PARDI PATA, TAL: PALSANA, DIST: SURAT, GUJARAT, INDIA, on 11-6-1945, (SON).
